/src/framework/XMLValidator.cpp:
Increment scanner error count from schema validator, not just in scanner itself.
/src/sax2/SAX2XMLReader.hpp:
Add pure virtual getErrorCount to SAX2XMLReader interface.
/src/parsers/SAX2XMLReaderImpl.hpp:
getErrorCount is virtual in this class reflecting derivation from SAX2XMLReader.
/src/internal/XMLScanner:
Add method incrementErrorCount for use by validator. Make sure to reset error count in _both_ the scanReset methods.

/src/internal/XMLScanner.cpp
/src/validators/DTD/DTDScanner.cpp
The start tag "<?xml" could be followed by (#x20 | #x9 | #xD | #xA)+.
Add support for tracking error count during parse; enables simple parse without requiring error handler.

/scripts/packageSources.pl
Keep the BCB4 project files in the source package.

/scripts/packageBinaries.pl
Fix the name of ICU dll.

Check for existance of MacOS Unicode Converter routines prior to instanciating our transcoder object; Xerces will thus panic, rather than crash, if they don't exist. Add support to check for existance of MacOS Unicode Converter to avoid calling through NULL pointer
LinuxPlatformUtils.cpp: Need to add header "linux/limits" for definition of PATH_MAX
built-in buffer limit could be smaller than system limit, use PATH_MAX instead
DOMParser.cpp: The public id was set twice and the system id was not set on Notations
Added new option to the parsers so that the NEL (0x85) char can be treated as a newline character
DTDScanner: Reuse grammar should allow users to use any stored element decl as root
MacOSUnicodeConverter: Fix include path, Updates to reflect changes for Mac OS X final and Update MacOS projects for Mac OS X final ProjectBuilder
AttrImpl: allow value to be set to null
DOMParser: Attribute default values not printed in document type internal subset interface
DTDElementDecl: Error checking for null content spec
When Standalone="yes", it is NOT supposed to accept element which is defined in external DTD with #FIXED attribute
Update packageBinaries.pl for ICU 1.8. ICU debug .lib file names and locations changed
/src/util/AutoSense.hpp: AutoSense looks for "IRIX" when it should look for "sgi" or "__sgi".
/src/Makefile.incl: The Makefiles fail to locate .cpp -> .o dependency and rebuild .o all the time
/src/util/XMLURL.cpp: Accessing an XML file using the file "protocol" and a UNC path fails to open the file
IconvTransService.cpp and Iconv390TransService.cpp: Seg fault when trying to parse empty filename
/src/internal/XMLScanner.cpp: Infinite loop caused by malformed XML. Happen when namespace is on.
Enabling libWWW NetAccessor support under UNIX. Tested with latest tarball of libWWW (w3c-libwww-5.3.2) under RedHat Linux 6.1.
StdInParse doesn't output filename or duration

ICUTranscoder::transcodeFrom() expects ICU function ucnv_toUnicode to return an extra element in fSrcOffsets to allow us to figure out the last char size, which in fact it is not. The fix is to compute the last char size ourselves using the total bytes used.
/src/util/XMLString.cpp: change limit test to reduce spurious pointer assignment warnings from BoundsChecker.
Better FAQ for the checksum error.
/src/internal/XMLReader.cpp: Core dump when UTF-16 encoding Contradicts actual encoding

Update samples/tests files for on UnixWare 7.1.1 with gcc 2.95. Add UNIXWARE platform defines to Makefile.incl, add recognition of sysv5uw7 to configure.in, and add unixware as recognized platform to runConfigure
Update support for SCO UnixWare 7 (gcc). Tested under UnixWare 7.1.1 with gcc version 2.95.2 19991024 (release) with gmake 3.79.1.
enable COMPAQ Tru64 UNIX machines to build xerces-c with gcc (tested using COMPAQ gcc version2.95.2 19991024 (release) and Tru64 V5.0 1094)
Rearranged statements in Initialize() so that platformInit() is called before an XMLMutex is created.
/src/util/Compilers/CSetDefs.hpp: define NO_NATIVE_BOOL macro only if not pre-defined/reserved
createPDF.jar and apachPDFStyle.xsl to convert documentation xml files to pdf format
